articles.title: CNESST orders shutdown of Douglas Hospital lab over asbestos risk after January flooding
articles.description: An over 150-year-old research wing at Montreal’s Douglas Mental Health University Institute has been ordered to shut down by Quebec’s workplace safety board (CNESST) after staff were exposed to a serious risk of asbestos when a pipe burst flooded several laboratories, late January.
